MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL36 Talyllyn area of Tywyn. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties. Restoration for those customers still off supply is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a grounded overhead line near Dolffanog and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:58am on 9th March 2021.
